from azure.storage.filedatalake import DataLakeServiceClient


def list_files(storage_account_name, storage_account_key, file_system_name):
    try:
        service_client = DataLakeServiceClient(account_url="{}://{}.dfs.core.windows.net".format(
            "https", storage_account_name), credential=storage_account_key)

        file_system_client = service_client.get_file_system_client(file_system_name)

        paths = file_system_client.get_paths()

        for path in paths:
            print(path.name)

    except Exception as e:
        print(e)


# Replace with your storage account name, key and file system name
storage_account_name = "dlsynapsefromscratchacct"
storage_account_key = "cxvFE17krNK3949U6SfetjT0o64iAhpwUS2SuxWTWsD+fGrS1vubbVPpdtc4wHOIJete85T/yP0J+AStMONYxw=="
file_system_name = "dlsynapsefromscratchfs"

list_files(storage_account_name, storage_account_key, file_system_name)
